abstract: Berkshire Hathaway, the investment company run by Warren E. Buffett, sold off its remaining five million shares of Bank of America in the fourth quarter.
snippet: Berkshire Hathaway, the investment company run by Warren E. Buffett, sold off its remaining five million shares of Bank of America in the fourth quarter.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett‘s investment company, Berkshire Hathaway, sold off its remaining five million shares in Bank of America last quarter, according to regulatory documents filed on Monday.

headline.main: Berkshire Closes Out Its Bank of America Stake

abstract: American hedge funds reported their quarterly holdings on Monday, offering rare insight into the stocks held by top money managers, including SAC Capital, Appaloosa Management, Greenlight Capital and Trian Partners.
snippet: American hedge funds reported their quarterly holdings on Monday, offering rare insight into the stocks held by top money managers, including SAC Capital, Appaloosa Management, Greenlight Capital and Trian Partners.
lead_paragraph: American hedge funds reported their quarterly holdings on Monday, offering the public a rare — albeit delayed — insight into the stocks held by top money managers.

headline.main: Getting a Glimpse Into Hedge Funds’ Holdings
